trans-unit.source: The audit log contains all actions performed on your resources.
trans-unit.target: The audit log contains all actions performed on your resources.

trans-unit.source: You can use the audit logs to find an error when troubleshooting or
trans-unit.target: You can use the audit logs to find an error when troubleshooting or

trans-unit.source: to monitor how a user in your organization modified a resource.
trans-unit.target: to monitor how a user in your organization modified a resource.

trans-unit.source: There are two important limitations to keep in mind when working with audit logs:
trans-unit.target: There are two important limitations to keep in mind when working with audit logs:

trans-unit.source: Audit logs are only retained for 90 days.
trans-unit.target: Audit logs are only retained for 90 days.

trans-unit.source: You can only query for a range of 15 days or less.
trans-unit.target: You can only query for a range of 15 days or less.
